sen.j: 藤原 長岡（ふじわら の ながおか、786年（延暦5年）- 849年（嘉祥2年））は、平安時代前期の官僚。
sen.e: FUJIWARA no Nagaoka (786-849) was a bureaucrat in the early Heian period.
FUJIWARA no Nagaoka (786-849) was a bureaucrat iduring the early Heian period.
FUJIWARA no Nagaoka (786 - 849) was a bureaucrat during the early Heian period.

sen.j: 右大臣藤原内麻呂の子。
sen.e: A son of FUJIWARA no Uchimaro, Minister of the Right.
He was the son of FUJIWARA no Uchimaro, Minister of the Right.
He was the son of FUJIWARA no Uchimaro, Udaijin (Minister of the Right).
sen.cmt: 用語リストに合わせました。

sen.e: Jushii (Junior Fourth Rank), Yamato no kuni Kokushi (governor of Yamato Province).
Jushii (Junior Fourth Rank), Yamato no kuni Kokushi (governor of Yamato Province).
Jushii (Junior Fourth Rank), Yamato no kuni no Kokushi (Governor of Yamato Province).
sen.cmt: 用語リストに合わせました。

sen.j: 武芸に優れていたとされる。
sen.e: It is said that he was excellent in military art.
It is said that he was excellent in military art.
It is said that he was excellent in military art.

sen.j: 807年（大同 (日本)2年）：陸奥国大掾に任ぜられる。
sen.e: Appointed to Mutsu no kuni daijo (Senior Secretary of Mutsu Province) in 807.
Appointed to Mutsu no kuni daijo (Senior Secretary of Mutsu Province) in 807.
807: Appointed to Mutsu no kuni daijo (Senior Secretary of Mutsu Province).
sen.cmt: コロンを使用しました。

sen.j: この間、左兵衛少将や、出羽国・駿河国・播磨国諸国の介を歴任。
sen.e: During this time, he successively held the positions of Sahyoe no shosho (minor captain of the Left Division of Middle Palace Guards) and Suke (vice governor) of Dewa Province, Suruga Province, and Harima Province.

During this time, he successively held the positions of Sahyoe no shosho (minor captain of the Left Division of Middle Palace Guards) and Suke (vice governor) of Dewa Province, Suruga Province, and Harima Province.

During this time, he successively held the positions of Sahyoe no shosho (minor captain of the Left Division of Middle Palace Guards) and Suke (vice governor) of Dewa Province, Suruga Province, and Harima Province.

sen.j: 824年（天長元年）：従五位下に叙せられる。
sen.e: Conferred to Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) in 824.
Conferred to Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) in 824.
824: Conferred to Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade).
sen.cmt: コロンを使用しました。

sen.j: この間、越前国・山城国・大和国の各国守を歴任。
sen.e: During this time, he successively held the positions of Echizen no kuni no kami (Governor of Echizen Province), Yamashiro no kuni no kami (Governor of Yamashiro Province), and Yamato no kuni no kami (governor of Yamato Province).

During this time, he successively held the positions of Echizen no kuni no kami (Governor of Echizen Province), Yamashiro no kuni no kami (Governor of Yamashiro Province), and Yamato no kuni no kami (governor of Yamato Province).
During this time, he successively held the positions of Kuni no kami (Governor) of Echizen Province, Yamashiro Province, and Yamato Province.
sen.cmt: 表現を前出に合わせました。

sen.j: 846年（承和 (日本)13年）：従四位上に叙せられる。
sen.e: Conferred to Jushiinojo (Junior Fourth Rank, Upper Grade) in 846.
Conferred to Jushiinojo (Junior Fourth Rank, Upper Grade) in 846.
846: Conferred to Jushiinojo (Junior Fourth Rank, Upper Grade).
sen.cmt: コロンを使用しました。
